name: YAPA - Yet Another Pomodoro Aplication
tagline: Minimalistic desktop timer app for Pomodoro Technique users
body:
### Welcome to YAPA Page.
YAPA is minimalistic desktop timer app for Pomodoro Technique users.
For more info about Pomodoro Technique go to [Pomodoro page](http://www.pomodorotechnique.com/) or [Wikipedia](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pomodoro_Technique)
![Main window](http://banasiak.me/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/yapa_main_info.png)

### Futures
These are the current features:
* Configurable periods
* Sound control
* Pomodoro™ counter :)
* Shows period progress on taskbar
* Control app using taskbar jumplist
* Select opacity for timer
* Select light or dark theme for timer

### Screenshots
1. Main window
![Main window](http://banasiak.me/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/yapa_main.png)
2. Settings window
![Settings window](http://banasiak.me/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/yapa_settings.png)
3. Jumplist
![Jumplist](http://banasiak.me/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/yapa_jumplist.png)
4. Progress bar
![Progress bar](http://banasiak.me/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/yapa_progress_status.png)

### Download
Binary files, for source code see links at top of page.
* [YAPA-1.0.0](http://banasiak.me/YAPA/YAPA-1.0.0.zip)
* [YAPA-1.0.0](http://banasiak.me/YAPA/YAPA-1.0.0-pl.zip) (PL version)

### Authors and Contributors
Łukasz Banasiak (@lukaszbanasiak)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with YAPA? Send message to me using my [website](http://banasiak.me/contact/).
